reviews.review:
This game is a masterpiece.
The Portal series are one of my favorite games of all time. 
my steam's username is partially based on those games, this I how much I liked them.
Even almost a decade later, this game is still amazing.
I really hope that one day a Portal 3 will be made.
Why are you still reading this? just buy it already.
Fun puzzle game, excellent use of a novel game mechanic.

hermoso, giro imesperado, buena historia. en resumen al resumen compralo, vale la pena
This game is so awesome highly recommend it

The new mechanics seem fun.

But in two hours of gameplay today I am completely turned off by the fat-shaming "jokes" from glados. I may play the rest of the game with the game audio turned off.

Just a heads-up: That coffee we gave you earlier had fluorescent calcium in it so we can track the neuronal activity in your brain. There's a slight chance the calcium could harden and vitrify your frontal lobe. Anyway, don't stress yourself thinking about it. I'm serious. Visualizing the scenario while under stress actually triggers the reaction.

+Rep Cave Johnson

Portal 2 es un juego de plataformas que contin√∫a con los actos que ocurren en la primera entrega.

El modo historia tiene parte de inspiraci√≥n en la primera parte del juego tipo, te ponen varios niveles, pero uno de los puntos que mejoran much√≠simo es que hacen el juego m√°s libres y que te vas moviendo por todo el mapa del laboratorio abandonado.

El modo multijugador es un modo bastante divertido en el cual puedes echarte bastantes risas con tus amigos y disfrutar bastante de todas las mec√°nicas que hay.

Es un juego con una historia bastante adictiva que una vez empieza te entran ganas de seguir hasta al final y hay bastantes horas de diversi√≥n.

Im very late to this game. After multiple recommendations and a super sale, I gave in. Worth every cent. This game takes puzzle games to a new level, especially with the sarcastic audio and occasional jump scare. It's the "perfect" game.
